alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Horry County through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Galivants Ferry, or 10 miles southeast of Mullins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loris, Galivants Ferry, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Aynor and Loris Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
